actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a standard for exposure to radon in indoor environments.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate a standard for exposure to radon in the interior of buildings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a standard for exposure to radon in indoor environments.
